text:
@dcexaminer @brianstelter @GenFlynn Because it's a MUCH BIGGER deal than the faulty Covid-19 statistics that #FakeNews has been spewing!  And what about the years spent reporting about #CollusionHoax? 
 How about reporting on the real story now?!  #ObaMAGAte #TreasonousTraitors #SpyGate #FISAGate #FakeNewsEpidemic
